price: ከወንድ ወይም ከሴት እርሱ አማኝ ኾኖ ከበጎ ሥራዎች አንዳችን የሚሠራም ሰው እነዚያ ገነትን ይገባሉ፡፡ በተምር ፍሬ ላይ ያለችን ነጥብ ያክል እንኳ አይበደሉም፡፡
arabic: وَمَن يَعۡمَلۡ مِنَ ٱلصَّٰلِحَٰتِ مِن ذَكَرٍ أَوۡ أُنثَىٰ وَهُوَ مُؤۡمِنٞ فَأُوْلَٰٓئِكَ يَدۡخُلُونَ ٱلۡجَنَّةَ وَلَا يُظۡلَمُونَ نَقِيرٗا

version.title: Amharic translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Amharic by Muhammad Sadeq and Muhammad Ath-Thany Habib. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: waman yaʿmal mina al-ṣāliḥāti min dhakarin aw unthā wahuwa mu'minun fa-ulāika yadkhulūna al-janata walā yuẓ'lamūna naqīran
translations: (even as much as) the speck on a date-seed
